I would like to start off by saying. I rarely give 5 stars ever and I have to say this is 5 star! I‚Äôm Puerto Rican from the Bronx and I fully approve of this place. The food the portions the flavor the everything. The staff are so nice and sweet.

Absolutely love this spot! Lechoneria New York 2 has some of the best food and drinks in Queens, hands down. Every time I come here, the flavors hit just right‚Äîauthentic, fresh, and full of love. The lechon is always cooked perfectly, and the portions are generous too. Drinks are strong, tasty, and reasonably priced. Whether I‚Äôm stopping in for a quick bite or hanging out for a while, the atmosphere is always welcoming. Highly recommend this place to anyone craving delicious Puerto Rican or Dominican food done right!
